name: Deepak Venugopal
content: Deepak Venugopal - Computer Science - The University of Memphis Skip to main content SearchX Safety & Security Prospective Students Current Students Parents & Family Alumni Veterans Faculty & Staff People Take Action Follow Us Online FacebookLinkedIn Home Computer Science People Faculty Pages Deepak Venugopal Deepak Venugopal Associate Professor and Graduate Coordinator Phone 901.678.1539 Email dvngopal@memphis.edu Fax 901.678.1506 Office Dunn Hall 317 Office Hours Call for hours Degree: PhD, Computer Science, University of Texas, Dallas, 2015 Research Interests:Machine learning, artificial intelligence Personal Website:https://sites.google.com/site/dvngopal/ Google Scholar Dr. Deepak Venugopal joined the Department as an assistant professor in Fall 2015 after completing his PhD in computer science at the University of Texas at Dallas. Dr. Venugopal's primary research interest is in developing fast, scalable, and accurate algorithms for inference and learning in probabilistic graphical models and their first-order extensions such as Markov Logic Networks. His work has resulted in key techniques that lift approximate inference methods to first-order models and has been published in several top-tier conferences in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence, such as NIPS, AAAI, UAI, and EMNLP.
